abstract: The troubled saga that has become the Tribune Company bankruptcy unraveled further as a lawyer for the publishing giant said negotiations with creditors had broken down.
snippet: The troubled saga that has become the Tribune Company bankruptcy unraveled further as a lawyer for the publishing giant said negotiations with creditors had broken down.
lead_paragraph: 6:53 p.m. | Updated  The troubled saga that has become the Tribune Company bankruptcy unraveled further on Friday as a lawyer for the publishing giant said negotiations with creditors had broken down, The New York Times’s Jeremy W. Peters reports.

headline.main: Tribune Co. Bankruptcy Plan Hits New Snag
